name: Dirt Bike Rider: Offroad Motorcross Stunt Mania
name_original: Dirt Bike Rider: Offroad Motorcross Stunt Mania
description:
Download Dirt Bike Rider Stunt Race 3D simulator, enjoy the ultimate bike rider game of 2016. Do xtreme stunts with trial bike over distinctive ramps. Put the pedal to metal and crazy jump over loops in modern city arena. Are you prepared to accept the offroad bike racing challenges? Get on trial moto for extreme bike flying adventures. Be a champion motorcycle racer in this crazy bike racing game. Ride police bike, not for chasing criminals, but to do insane stunts over multiple hurdles. Offroad motorbike racing was never this much challenging and entertaining before. Fly over high obstacles at blazing fast speed.


Ever dreamt of becoming a moto stunt rider? Hey rookie! Dust off your trail bike and join the bikers’ gang in xtreme moto-mania game. Go for speed racing adventure like a crazy pilot flying car over city streets. Feel the urge to drive fast and furious in offroad racing mania. Dirt Bike Rider Stunt Race bring you the exciting and fun-filled motocross game to become the ultimate roadster. Burn tyres on asphalt tracks and blow off dirt in offroad terrain. If you love racing bike games then this moto race simulator is best for you.



Mount your bike, strap up your gear and show mad skills of a crazy pilot. Rash riding without caring for traffic police and race as fast as you can to become a champion racer. Can you handle the fast paced trail racing in modern city? Enjoy the motorbike extreme racing in endless adventure game. Play Dirt Bike Rider Stunt Race and feel the adrenaline rush into blood as you drive motorbike in open world stunt arena.


Key Features of Dirt Bike Rider Stunt Race:
Endless motocross stunt racing adventures
Bumpy rides with extreme obstacles
Realistic auto physics for moto jumping
Vibrant 3D graphics and simple controls
Addictive gameplay optimized for mobile devices
Stunning motorbikes like police bike, offroad trail and sports bike
Massive open world environment & incredible stunt arena
We hope you enjoy our real bike racing game in uphill stunt arena. Give your feedback to see more updates in next releases!
